sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import orderService from '../services/orderService'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [orderStats, setOrderStats] = useState(null); const [recentOrders, setRecentOrders] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData(); }, []); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { // Fetch order statistics const statsResult = await orderService.getOrderStats(); if (statsResult.success) { setOrderStats(statsResult.data); } // Fetch recent orders const ordersResult = await orderService.getOrders({ limit: 5 }); if (ordersResult.success) { setRecentOrders(ordersResult.data); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/'); }; const formatPrice = (price) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD' }).format(price); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.name}!

{user?.role} Dashboard

Browse All Services Home
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Profile Card */}
{user?.name?.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}
Profile
{user?.name}

Email: {user?.email}

Role: {user?.role}

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{user?.role === 'client' ? (
View My Orders Browse Services
) : (
View My Work Create New Gig Manage My Gigs
)}
{/* Stats */}

Statistics

{loading ? (
) : orderStats ? (
Total Orders: {orderStats.totals.totalOrders}
{user?.role === 'client' ? 'Total Spent:' : 'Total Earned:'} {formatPrice(orderStats.totals.totalRevenue)}
Active Orders: {(orderStats.statusBreakdown.paid?.count || 0) + (orderStats.statusBreakdown.in_progress?.count || 0)}
Completed: {orderStats.statusBreakdown.completed?.count || 0}
) : (
Total Orders: 0
{user?.role === 'client' ? 'Total Spent:' : 'Total Earned:'} $0
Active Orders: 0
)}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Orders

{recentOrders.length > 0 && ( View all → )}
{loading ? (
{[1, 2, 3].map((i) => (
))}
) : recentOrders.length > 0 ? (
{recentOrders.map((order) => (
{order.gig?.title?.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}

{order.gig?.title}

{orderService.getStatusText(order.status)}

{user?.role === 'client' ? order.freelancer?.name : order.client?.name}

{formatPrice(order.amount)}

{new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

))}
) : (

No orders yet.

{user?.role === 'client' ? 'Start by browsing available services and placing your first order.' : 'Create attractive gigs to start receiving orders from clients.' }

{user?.role === 'client' ? 'Browse Services' : 'View Available Gigs'}
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
